name: Tofu Scramble
description: This tofu scramble with tomatoes and chives is perfect for long weekend breakfasts. Kala Namak is the secret ingredient, which makes it taste like eggs!
recipeIngredient: 1 tablepoon soy cuisine ((optional), you can also use almond butter instead or just leave it out)
1/4 cup fresh chives, cut into rings

recipeInstructions.text: Use a fork or hands to crumble the tofu into small pieces. In a medium pan, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Cook the tofu for 1 minute, then stir in the red onion.
recipeInstructions.name: Use a fork or hands to crumble the tofu into small pieces. In a medium pan, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Cook the tofu for 1 minute, then stir in the red onion.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook for another 2 minutes before adding the turmeric. Add the water and season with soy sauce, kala namak, and black pepper.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook for another 2 minutes before adding the turmeric. Add the water and season with soy sauce, kala namak, and black pepper.

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the tomato into small chunks and add it to the scrambled tofu. Sprinkle with chives.
recipeInstructions.name: Cut the tomato into small chunks and add it to the scrambled tofu. Sprinkle with chives.

keywords: tofu scramble, tofu scramble recipe, tofu scrambled eggs
